channel.title: 508 server compiler
channel.description:
My server is a 508 based from x r scape.
When i compile this happens
[code]Press any key to continue...[/code] so i press a key and restart server and kaboom nothing happend at all
This is my compiler
[code]@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/update/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/items/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/combat/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java pause[/code]

item.title: 508 server compiler
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Impressive. Just put a compiler in each individual folder until you can figure out how to compile all folders in one batch file. Then just compile whatever you edit per folder.

Read full topic

My server is a 508 based from x r scape.

When i compile this happens

Press any key to continue...

so i press a key and restart server and kaboom nothing happend at all

This is my compiler
